name: Slangitright
0:
”Alexa, open slang it right”
”Alexa,start slang it right and recommend a slang word”
”Alexa, launch slang it right”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: slang it right
des: This skill is created keeping generation gap in mind. This is targeted for parents and others who cannot hold grasp of slang words to easily make them understand what's going around the social media. Social media plays a major role in everyone's day to day life and a lot of slang words floating around, and in an attempt to "assume" the meaning of slang, the main motive is often interpreted incorrectly. So, this is a skill which will remind you of slang words and that too trending slang words..So you don't lag behind.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
